instruction.value: Instill into conjuctiva of LEFT eye 15 minutes prior to examination.
Instill into conjuctiva of LEFT eye 20 minutes prior to examination.
Instill into conjuctiva of RIGHT eye 15 minutes prior to examination.
Instill into conjuctiva of RIGHT eye 20 minutes prior to examination.
Instill into conjuctiva of affected eye(s) 15 minutes prior to examination.
Instill into conjuctiva of affected eye(s) 20 minutes prior to examination.
Instill into conjuctiva of LEFT eye and repeat dose in 5 minutes.
Instill into conjuctiva of RIGHT eye and repeat dose in 5 minutes.
Instill into conjuctiva of affected eye(s) and repeat dose in 5 minutes.
